lyrics:
17 contributorsif you see kay lyricsrefrain
if you see my friend doesnt matter where or when

verse 1

and now my head is sore
and if i try to sail back in
shes gonna push me from the shore
now i wont even get the time of day
no way no way no
not for what i said
but for what i didnt say what i didnt say so

and if you see kay let her know i want her back

and make sure you say im sweet fa without her
if you see kay

how it truly broke my heart to have to watch her leave

knew the truth but still she looked me in the eyes and lied
saying its time to cut the ties time to say goodbye
so she left but she nevernever left my nevernever left my mind
